Flow.description: Phase -1 Changes (Removed Opportunity and Job Object instances)

formulas.name: BodyAndTitleForChannelsRecordType
formulas.expression: 'A client ' + {!$Record.Name} +' is created recently please review.'

formulas.name: BodyAndTitleForEONotification
formulas.expression: 'Request you to close all Open Enquiries related to '+ {!$Record.Name}+' as it has been Greylisted.'

formulas.name: BodyAndTitleForJo
formulas.expression: 'Request you to close all Open Jobs related to ' + {!$Record.Name} + ' as it has been Greylisted.'

formulas.name: bodyAndTitleForKeyAccount
formulas.expression: {!NameOfClients} + ' has been classified from Non-Key Account to Key Account '

formulas.name: BodyAndTitleForNewKeyAcountAdd
formulas.expression: ' The Non-Key Account for ' + {!$Record.Key_Account_360__r.Name} + ' has been classified into a Key Account.'

formulas.name: BodyAndTitleForPriorKeyAccount
formulas.expression: 'The Key Account for ' +{!$Record__Prior.Key_Account_360__r.Name} +' has been classified into a Non-Key Account. '

formulas.name: bodyAndTitlePriorAccount
formulas.expression: {!NameOfClients} + ' has been classified from Key Account to Non-Key Account '

formulas.name: notificationBodyAndTitleForCheckbox
formulas.expression: 'The Account ' +{!$Record.Name} +' has been associated with the Key Account ' +{!$Record.GT_Client_Group__r.Key_Account_360__r.Name}+'.'

formulas.name: NotificationBodyAndTitlePriorCheckbox
formulas.expression: 'The Account '+{!$Record__Prior.Name} +' has been deassociated with the Key Account '+{!$Record__Prior.GT_Client_Group__r.Key_Account_360__r.Name} + '.'

formulas.name: titleAndBodyForApprovalApproved
formulas.expression: {!$Record.Name} + ' has been approved by the DS Team'

formulas.name: titleAndBodyForApprovalReject
formulas.expression: {!$Record.Name} + ' has been rejected by the DS Team'
